documents.document: This is one hell of a game. Still hate the patriots though #SuperBowl
By the way, the BBC coverage has been brilliant so far. Team much more likeable than Sky. #SuperBowl
That was bloody good. Telephone is a belter of a song #SuperBowl
Holy Christ. That is incredible #SuperBowl
Now, when will Kenny Wright be given a decent job?
Mixed feelings. Incredible performance 2nd half but the penalty decisions are shocking.
Considering his previous history, another 15. Will always be a question mark until we go through a tough game. https://t.co/kR1j7WeFTZ
@Plac1dCasual @cartujakds nearly every article mentions donations or calls out those who don't pay enough. Something don't seem right
@Plac1dCasual @cartujakds doubt it. But what do they get in return for donating? More rambling articles howling at the moon.
@Plac1dCasual @cartujakds best that you don't get associated with it either way. The guy seems a lunatic
Derek McInnes thinks Aberdeen should have got something from this..... https://t.co/fkH0sp26tj
If the records gonna go then this is the night. Missing key players, defence nervous. #celtic
Micheal shocked that some people have jobs.... https://t.co/1yngYeqZbM
It's bloody great being a Celtic fan right now 🍀
Someone at the Scotsman has been on the booze https://t.co/tOt26TJrQa
It appears that Glasgow has no knee scan facilities.... https://t.co/rn5VglEbp5
You'd think Chelsea would get him a private jet. Not convinced.
Finally, a manager who understands the media game. https://t.co/5lmG9VPyZb
There in spirit with you all #TrumpProtest https://t.co/uNWmf5NXWg
Saying that, If Chelsea offer anything like that then we have to take it. It's a win win for us - money now or money later.
Highly doubt this. Both the interested party and the valuation seems bollocks https://t.co/WCQAgOjfUN
@vaselby @NickyAACampbell it's an alternative fact 😉
Credit where it's due. Bitton has been very good so far. #celtic
Hearts very limited but the ultra defensive approach is a mistake.We've looked most troubled when teams have had a go at us (ala Motherwell)
Bit disjointed but to be expected with the forced team selection. Need another goal to kill this. #celtic
"If"?!?! https://t.co/aHlWYK6cEs
@thewadekeller @AndyO1507 @prowrestling their lack of a social media policy is a valid point, but this is not a good example.
@thewadekeller @AndyO1507 @prowrestling but it's exactly the policy they should have. not under character name, an average fan won't see it
Considering his age etc, if they offer a few £mil then we'll sell. Would be a loss though https://t.co/DkoPl1ThgC
@FrancisMcCabe I don't see why that can't be done at another team. He was already a decent SPL player, not sure how this will improve him
@WS2N28 I could gone trump style and ended with SAD! 😉
@SartoMutiny hypothetical obviously 😉 Buying from others is 1 thing, loaning to teams in same league doesn't sit right.
We should not be loaning players to Aberdeen. Period. It is not our job to strengthen other teams in the league.
@newgenpodcast take as much time as you need. It's a hard journey but it does get better (I know from experience). Take care
Packers, you've broke my heart 💔
Yeah, we're toast. #packers
The packers defence is horrific. This is turning into a car crash.

One hell of a catch.
One hell of a QB.
One hell of a game.
#NFLPlayoffs #GoPackGo
PACKERS WIN! PACKERS WIN! #GoPackGo
Always liked him as a pundit. The lack of respect he was given post England was shocking https://t.co/PunllAOjYZ
Still one of the best goals I've seen in person. Cracking strike. https://t.co/8frZ9x6CNH
Always loved this building. Looks like it has a new fan. #kelvingrove https://t.co/g1UZ2oEHnk
@SartoMutiny I thought you were being your usual pessimistic self. Utd look terrified, really poor.
Hibs playing well but Utd making it easy. Too slow and ponderous - they look nervous.
@SartoMutiny I take back what I said pre match. This is going to be a hammering.
@18Fitzy88 forgot to ask...did the bf survived the parents? 😉
@cathynewman @steve_steglitz seems much more of an issue in England. In Scotland (central belt) I can get an appt in 3 days.
Feel strangely sad about tonight's game. From highs and horrific lows of Lennons Celtic tenure to managing Hibs. That's a fall from grace...
@theanalyst there isn't enough characters 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍
I'm only stating what we already know but the relevance of the press in Scotland is dying rapidly.
Press obsessed with Le Guen as "Spiersy" has book to flog. Same week we have a £25mil player firing a bidding war and a crunch match.
Instead of build up to a crunch match we have wall to wall coverage of a manager who left a club 10 years ago which then died #irrelevant
Anyone who says Scottish football is dead needs to look at Hibs v Utd tonight. The type of positive story which the press ignore
So tonight I saw @SartoMutiny meet his fans in person. A beautiful moment.
Barry Ferguson gets yet another platform. #cronyism https://t.co/xEe9MB1hrW
It's haemorrhoids https://t.co/Mrrvr6e10i
Boyd is currently helping coach young players at Kilmarnock. God help them https://t.co/LBn22TEoW2
@RaeComm absolutely. Had hoped he could get more out of the squad but transformation of Forrest, Brown, Armstrong is incredible.
@90MinuteCynic @Ginty1888 @YouTube that is brilliant, well done 👏
@SartoMutiny that is not in doubt 💩
@SartoMutiny the rest of us have the option of Phil and Ally or Robbie Williams..... 😵
Celtic. You are bloody beautiful.
@cj86_09 he must be raging! 😆
The post match Taylor interview is gonna be special.... #pdcdarts
He's making him sign the board!!!!!!!!! #darts #pdcdarts
@celticrumours those 5 folk wouldn't have an excuse. Just be quiet for 1 minute, simple.
Angry darts interviews are magic https://t.co/SB31DD4GJu
It's nearly the new year. Queue the obligatory Phil Taylor classless interview. https://t.co/0OmWJLO6Zs
This is a brilliant piece of writing. Raises so many more questions https://t.co/5cUzBGZ8v4
It's hard to not get caught up in the hype but the facts don't lie. This is their biggest game, it's not for us.
Playing level, Managerial, Boardroom, Players, Revenue. The list goes on...
The implied view in all coverage is that somehow Rangers are at the same operating level as Celtic. That is patently wrong on so many levels
I'm less offended by the OF tag than many but it's still amazing how the coverage glosses over their death.
I assume that's because it would raise too many awkward questions re their manager and crap players...
Interesting how all the Rangers talk pre match is focused on the past and their "history". No focus on tactics or how they aim to beat us
Not sure where to even start with this one..... https://t.co/8LXJDV9Gsw
And so it begins.... https://t.co/AvvikZKunU
@CelticFCSLO JS screen broken. Makes showing the 2016 highlights package a bit pointless... https://t.co/7nYeSamqqp
Collum strikes again.
Great pass by McGregor. He may be limited but I still think there's a player in there. #celtic
@c67cb11f14b0422 I was at the game and agree with @Barcabhoy1 . I like Hendo but he's limited, started well but too many limitations sadly
@MaleysBhoys @fitzpas @krys1888 that's only going to push the problem into other areas. Bad plan
One size fits all redemption. Thank god Hitler didn't apply for the job then. https://t.co/4eG2vG2iVu
Good deal for u but what Hibs gain I dunno. If he's as fat and useless as his last appearances then Hibs are burnin… https://t.co/cX9LDwHKCU
@pauloneil1874 @SartoMutiny he's always been lazy. Hibs need someone who will fight and get stuck in - he's the polar opposite.
@SartoMutiny if he's as fat as he was last time he played for us then you have nothing to worry about. Waste of wages
@SartoMutiny he won them the cup....
Just said on @BBCSportsound : "Malky is an excellent networker with great people skills" We are talking about the… https://t.co/DmNlHJVLJl
Now @BBCSportsound are comparing Mackay to Griffiths.Last time I looked,Griffiths wont be in charge ofyouth development of AN ENTIRE COUNTRY
So now @BBCSportsound are comparing Barry Ferguson giving the V to Malky Mackay and his racist, homophobic comments. Beyond madness now
@BBCSportsound so what if Barry likes him or if @bbckennymac thinks hes a nice guy. He has ZERO confidence of fans,stop dismissing this fact
@BBCSportsound regardless of his "abilities", personality etc, fact is that he has zero confidence of supporters. This will do untold damage
@BBCSportsound really disappointing so far. Continual defence made for this appointment, no conflicting view offered apart from texts/tweets
And again, let me ask, what qualifications does Malky MacKay have that makes him the best man for performance director? NONE
As Mackay is just toxic and youth development in our country is about to take a major step back.
I had hoped that Celtic would work closely with a new Performance Director. But it's best to stay distant and do our own thing.
The role of performance director is to improve Scottish football not to help rehabilitate a racists PR image. https://t.co/70NIbxQyIi
Remind me never to take SRTRC seriously again. This is a joke. https://t.co/4W8EyBuhAc
Scottish football is in the state if us due to this jobs for the boys mentality. The same detractors of Cathro are quiet re MacKay...
Even if we put his racism and extreme views to one side (impossible), Mackay is not remotely qualified for a performance director role.
